title: How to Draw Underwater Animals

steps.headline: Begin by drawing outlines of the whale and octopus.
steps.description: You can also add the top half of the jellyfish. Remember to draw the whale significantly bigger than everything else!

steps.headline: Add detail to the whale.
steps.description: Add his fins, his left eye and various line details. Use squiggly lines to draw the mouth.

steps.headline: Draw the eyes the octopus and lines on its body.
steps.description: You can also add detail to the top of the jellyfish. Add the finishing touch to your artwork by sketching a school of fish.

steps.headline: Outline your work with permanent media (like ink or paint).

text: Begin by drawing outlines of the whale and octopus. You can also add the top half of the jellyfish. Remember to draw the whale significantly bigger than everything else! Add detail to the whale. Add his fins, his left eye and various line details. Use squiggly lines to draw the mouth. Add detail to the jellyfish. Don't forget its tentacles! Draw the eyes the octopus and lines on its body. You can also add detail to the top of the jellyfish. Add the finishing touch to your artwork by sketching a school of fish. Outline your work with permanent media (like ink or paint). Erase your penciled drawing. Color and you’re done!
